channel.title: CVE Feed for Measuresoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Measuresoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2896|2024-09-16T18:13:13.378Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: Measuresoft ScadaPro Server (All Versions) allows use after free while processing a specific project file.

item.title: CVE-2022-3263|2024-09-16T19:35:43.783Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: The security descriptor of Measuresoft ScadaPro Server version 6.7 has inconsistent permissions, which could allow a local user with limited privileges to modify the service binary path and start malicious commands with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-2894|2024-09-16T18:48:55.668Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro%20server
item.description: Measuresoft ScadaPro Server (All Versions) uses unmaintained ActiveX controls. The controls may allow seven untrusted pointer deference instances while processing a specific project file.

item.title: CVE-2024-3746|2024-08-01T20:20:01.065Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro
item.description: The entire parent directory - C:\ScadaPro and its sub-directories and files are configured by default to allow user, including unprivileged users, to write or overwrite files.

item.title: CVE-2024-3746|2024-06-04T17:33:16.455Z -- measuresoft -- scadapro
item.description: The entire parent directory - C:\ScadaPro and its sub-directories and files are configured by default to allow user, including unprivileged users, to write or overwrite files.
